metadata.title: Taletix - Get the best talent to boost your business
metadata.description: Connecting talents and projects to boost your business

hero.heading: Get the <mark>best talent</mark> to boost your business

services.heading: Our services
services.description: We provide the best talents to help with your projects. From design to development, we've got you covered.

web-development.heading: Web Development
web-development.description: Stunning, high-performance websites and web applications designed to elevate your brand and drive growth.

integrations-and-social-networks.heading: Integrations & Social Networks
integrations-and-social-networks.description: Seamless integrations with top-tier services to streamline your workflow and power your business.

mobile-development.heading: Mobile Development
mobile-development.description: Powerful, user-friendly mobile applications designed to enhance engagement and accelerate your success.

ai-integrations.heading: AI Integrations
ai-integrations.description: Leverage the power of AI to automate, optimize, and revolutionize your digital presence.

projects.heading: Projects
projects.description: Discover our innovative projects, where cutting-edge technology meets creativity to deliver exceptional results.

call-to-action.heading: Don't waste time, start a project <effect>Now!</effect>

pricing.heading: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that best fits your needs. If you need a custom plan, don't hesitate to contact us.

star.name: Star
star.description: For small projects like content pages, social media design, and more.

star-plus.name: Star Plus
star-plus.description: Ideal for growing businesses that need more functionality and support.

big-star.name: Big Star
big-star.description: For large projects that require advanced solutions and scalability.

features.heading: Compare features
features.description: Compare the features to choose the best plan for your needs.

everything-before.heading: Everything above
everything-before.description: Includes all features from previous plans.

brand-design.heading: Brand Design
brand-design.description: Create a unique and memorable brand identity.

content-web-page.heading: Content Web Page
content-web-page.description: Design and develop content-rich web pages.

social-networks-design.heading: Social Networks Design
social-networks-design.description: Design attractive social media profiles and posts.

maintenance.heading: Maintenance
maintenance.description: We provide maintenance and updates to your service.

basic-support.heading: Basic Support
basic-support.description: Receive basic support for your projects.

custom-web-design.heading: Custom Web Design
custom-web-design.description: Web design tailored to your specific needs.

ui-ux-improvement.heading: UI/UX Improvement
ui-ux-improvement.description: Improve the user interface and user experience.

seo-optimization.heading: SEO Optimization
seo-optimization.description: Improve your website's ranking in search engines.

e-commerce-integration.heading: E-commerce Integration
e-commerce-integration.description: Integrate e-commerce functionality into your site.

dedicated-support.heading: Dedicated Support
dedicated-support.description: Receive dedicated support for your projects.

cloud-integration.heading: Cloud Integration
cloud-integration.description: Integrate cloud services into your solutions.

free-maintenance.description: After that, it will cost {price} per month.

hero.heading: Meet our <mark>talents</mark>
hero.description: Our talented team of passionate developers, designers, and marketing engineers is ready to bring your projects to life. With creativity and expertise, they'll help you turn ideas into reality.

join.heading: Want to <mark>join our team</mark>?
join.description: We're always looking for new talents.

start.heading: Start a <mark>new project!</mark>
start.description: Tell us about your project and we'll help make it a reality.
